title: Betty & Veronica: Vixens Vol. 1
description: The toughest gang in Riverdale is one you'd least the Vixens, led by Riverdale High's own Betty and Veronica!Rising stars Jamie L. Rotante and artist Eva Cabrera (Black Mask's Kim & Kim) assemble The a squad brought together to take out the dangerous Southside Serpents gang! These aren't "Archie's Girls" -- they're starting a revolution in Riverdale.
author: Jamie Lee Rotante
